low_support: It’s okay to feel this way sometimes. Taking small breaks can help.
You’re not alone. Gentle self-care can make a difference.
medium_support: It sounds like you’re going through a tough time. Reaching out for support could be helpful.
Your feelings are valid. Talking to someone you trust may help.
high_support: You deserve support during this time. Please consider reaching out to a trusted person or professional help.
If you feel overwhelmed, connecting with a support service can be an important step.
